description.short: Transform Notion documents into DocuSign-ready contracts.
description.long:
Seamlessly convert your Notion documents into professional DocuSign contracts while preserving formatting and branding. This integration enables teams to:
- Export Notion pages directly to DocuSign while maintaining document formatting

- Map Notion database fields to DocuSign form fields automatically


- Track document status and signature progress within Notion

- Automatically archive signed documents with cloud storage integration

- Access signed documents directly from your Notion workspace

Perfect for teams who manage contracts and need to streamline their document workflow from creation to signature.
